stories.text:
Hey there HN! We're a pair of devs looking to get feedback for our open-source project.

We're remote engineers who have contracted for many clients overseas. There's a problem that all codebases share: Onboarding devs to a new codebase is hard no matter what.

We're also open-source engineers and learned about the techniques used in OSS to tackle the problem. Please give us your feedback.

Homepage: https://watermelon.tools/

Repo: https://github.com/watermelontools/wm-extension

Install: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Watermel...
stories.title: Show HN: Watermelon – open-source VSC ext. to document code and view Git blame

stories.text:
Sharing all the stats of https://jobboardsearch.com since launched paid upgrades 1 month ago.

1) Revenue → $1.307,50 2) Traffic → 98.872 3) Countries → 4) Feature Tags → 5) Referrals → 34.322 ↗

1) Revenue $1.307.50

• GoldSponsorship → $348.50 • SilverSponsorship → $398 • BronzeSponsorship → $248 • Board Upgrades→ $313

2) Traffic

• Views → 98.872 • Daily Avg → 3.090 • Unique → 42.446 • Daily Avg → 1.326 • Newsletter Subs → 210

3) Countries

USA 45% Nigeria → 7.4% Canada → 6.0% UK → 5.6% India → 4.6% China → 3.3% Germany → 2.6% Australia → 1.5% Argentina → 1.5% Netherlands → 1.2% France → 1.0%

4) Feature/Filter Tags

Remote Jobs → 50.1% Entry level → 18.2% Salary required → 10.6% No degree required → 6.9% Design Jobs → 1.5% Web3 Companies → 1.0%

5) Referrals ↗ 34.322

• GoldSponsor (Hirekite)→ 3.7k • SilverSponsor (Remote Web3 Jobs)→ 1.9k • BronzeSponsor (4 day week)→ 3.4k • RemoteOK (RemoteOK)→ 1.8k

I honestly wish http://jobboardsearch.com helps a lot of people to find a good job!

There is still a lot to improve, I am working hard on it

PS: Do you want to be seen by thousands of job seekers ?

Get a Sponsored Slot, next period starting 15th May only Gold one is available!

Board Upgrades are a great deal from $19

Check out https://jobboardsearch.com/add-board

Can't afford it and need a discount, wish to get bulk months or just say hi, please DM on Twitter https://twitter.com/rrmdp
stories.title: $1.307,50 in revenue since launched Job Board Search 1 month ago

stories.text: I want to buy a wireless IP camera for indoor or outdoor use that I can access with Python or other languages.  I don't want it to have any parts made in China.  Anyone know of a good camera for the job?
stories.title: Ask HN: Any relatively cheap NDAA-compliant wireless IP cameras?

stories.text:
Hey folks, I’m in the market to upgrade my kids computing power during the summer. They use chrome books for school and all but I’d like to get them proper windows laptops to create their own apps and they’re ready to move past scratch.

Thanks in advance!
stories.title: Ask HN: What’s the Best Sub 1k laptop?
